Some [[dye]]able materials in the game have specific, dedicated '''undyed''' variants, in addition to being dyeable in 16 colors.

== ''Minecraft'' ==
* {{BlockLink|Terracotta}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Stained Terracotta]]
* {{BlockLink|Glass}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Stained Glass]].
* {{BlockLink|Glass Pane}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Stained Glass Pane]]s.
* {{BlockLink|Shulker Box}} &ndash; Undyed variant of the [[Shulker Box]].
* {{ItemLink|Candle}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Candle]]s.
* {{ItemLink|Bundle}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Bundle]]s.
* {{BlockLink|Hardened Glass}}{{only|edu|short=1}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Hardened Stained Glass]].
* {{BlockLink|Hardened Glass Pane}}{{only|edu|short=1}} &ndash; Undyed variant of [[Hardened Stained Glass Pane]]s.
